markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ranger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=722) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 228 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ranger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=9)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 14

</column>

---

You become trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16); if you were already trained in Survival, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice. You become trained in ranger class DC.

 You can use the Hunt Prey action.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the ranger archetype.

<document level="2" id="action-10" />

<title level="2">Ranger Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Hunter's Trick](/Feats.aspx?ID=723), [Master Spotter (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=726), [Ranger Resiliency](/Feats.aspx?ID=724)
name: Ranger Dedication

---

<summary>
You become a multiclass ranger.
</summary>
